actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the inclusion of a scenic shoreline drive in the management plan for the Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore in the State of Michigan.

summary.text: Prohibits the inclusion of a scenic shoreline drive in the land and water management plan for the Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore in the State of Michigan.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the inclusion of a scenic shoreline drive in the management plan for the Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore in the State of Michigan.
